Feat.Name: Dhampir Traits
Feat.Description: You do not need to breathe underwater.

Feat.Name: Vampiric Bite
Feat.Description: Single Target Action: You bite target creature at touch range, dealing 1d4 Piercing Damage per Character Level. This scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (though is not a weapon attack and cannot critical). If that creature is a living and corporeal creature, you heal for 10 + (Heroic Character Level x Constitution Modifier) number of Hit Points from Positive energy. You may use this twice per Rest. (6 second cooldown).

Feat.Name: Past Life: Dhampir
Feat.Description: You were an Dhampir in a previous life Tier1: +1 Hide Tier2: +1 Strength Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point
